name: Scringo
overview:
Scringo is the home for in-app features, that will help mobile app developers make their apps more social, and more engaging.

Scringo provides a cross-platform social SDK that will enable app developers to add social discovery, engagement and monetization features to their apps. Scringo’s fully-customizable social bar is activated by swiping from the right of the screen, therefore not interrupting the app’s flow and UI.

Scringo includes features that are added to the hidden social bar and enable social discovery for its users (Chat, Radar, Activity feed and more..), better engagement between the developer and its users (Feedback, Contact, System messages and more..) and will soon enable exciting new monetization and promotion features!

No UI interference, fully customizable, completely free!
